import Data from '../Services/Data' import '../Styles/buttons/button.css' import '../Styles/components/cards.css' import { FaBirthdayCake } from 'react-icons/fa' import { AiFillMedicineBox } from 'react-icons/ai' import { DiGithubAlt } from 'react-icons/di' import Slider from 'react-slick' // import 'slick-carousel/slick/slick.css' // import 'slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css' const Cards = () => { let settings = { dot: true, infinite:true, speed:500, slidesToShow:1, slidesToScroll:1, cssEase:'linear' } return ( <>
